title: How to start as a freelancer in SEO & SEM - Quora

response.answer_text: You can start your career as a freelancer in SEO and SEM at any moment. Before starting your career as a freelancer make sure that you did proper homework for the same. The reason behind this is, there are so many things and questions arises in your mind as well as in customers mind that you need to face and sort it out. You should capable enough to deal with the same. Before starting as a freelancer you should be focused and clear with your mindset that what is the motto behind the same? and how you're going to execute the plan for the same. There are certain activities that you need to do on a daily basis so that you can start SEO and SEM as a freelancer. Who don’t want to be a freelance? Freelancing gives you freedom from everything i.e. time, money or anything. But In starting of freelancing we faces many problems. Here are some ways to try to get freelance work: Freelancing websites- Register as freelancer on Freelancing sites such as Upwork, Fiverr, Guru and many others. But these sites have a lot of competition.Create Your work Portfolio- Add your previous work in your portfolio so that new clients can see your work experience and quality. You can do that by creating your own personal site and adding your work details to social profiles.Use LinkedIn- LinkedIn is the best professional platform to connect with business owner who need freelancers. Ask your previous client to give you a recommendation. Add your published work to your LinkedIn profile.Use social media- Don’t think social media is a waste of time. There are many opportunities, you just need to find out those opportunities. Communicate with right people and business owners who can give you work. Show everyone that you are expert in your niche using social media.Use QA sites- Show everyone that you are expert by answering questions in your related niche. And Let Others know your abilities & work qualities and they need you.Ask your previous clients to work with you again.Ask your fellow workers to recommend you.Pass Google Exams and get google Ad-words certificate and put it in front of your website, social media profiles and on LinkedIn profile.Help as many as people you can in your niche. (Personally Favorite)Personally I prefer LinkedIn. I hope this will be helpful for you. Show your Appreciation by Upvoting!
